009package imagingbook.common.geometry.basic;
010
011/**
012 * Interface specifying a 2D curve capable of calculating the minimum
013 * distance to a given point.
014 *  
015 * @author WB
016 *
017 */
018public interface Curve2d {
019        
020        /**
021         * Returns the minimum distance from the specified point to this curve.
022         * 
023         * @param p a 2D point
024         * @return the minimum distance
025         */
026        public double getDistance(Pnt2d p);
027
028}
